name: fluentd
description: Fluentd is an open source data collector for unified logging layer, designed to efficiently collect, filter, and forward log data from various sources.
values:
# Fluentd configuration
# Ref: https://github.com/fluent/helm-charts/blob/main/charts/fluentd/values.yaml

## Global settings
global:
  imageRegistry: ""
  imagePullSecrets: []
  storageClass: ""

## Fluentd settings
fluentd:
  ## Image settings
  image:
    repository: fluent/fluentd
    tag: "v1.16.3-1.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  ## Number of replicas
  replicas: 1
  
  ## Resources settings
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
    requests:
      cpu: 250m
      memory: 256Mi
  
  ## Configuration for Fluentd
  configMaps:
    # Main Fluentd configuration
    fluentd.conf: |
      <source>
        @type forward
        port 24224
        bind 0.0.0.0
      </source>
      
      <match **>
        @type stdout
      </match>
  
  ## Persistence settings
  persistence:
    enabled: false
    size: 10Gi
    storageClass: ""
  
  ## Service settings
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 24224
    targetPort: 24224
    annotations: {}
  
  ## ServiceAccount settings
  serviceAccount:
    create: true
    name: ""

## Metrics settings
metrics:
  enabled: false
  serviceMonitor:
    enabled: false
  prometheusRule: 
    enabled: false

## Buffer settings
buffer:
  # Size of the buffer chunk
  chunkLimitSize: "8MB"
  # Total buffer size limit
  totalLimitSize: "256MB"
  # Chunk limit records
  chunkLimitRecords: 65536

## Logging settings
logging:
  level: "info"

name: opensearch
description: OpenSearch is a distributed search and analytics engine based on Apache Lucene. It provides a RESTful multi-tenant database with a HTTP web interface and schema-free JSON documents.
values:
# OpenSearch configuration
# Ref: https://github.com/opensearch-project/helm-charts/blob/main/charts/opensearch/values.yaml

## Global settings
global:
  imageRegistry: ""
  imagePullSecrets: []
  storageClass: ""

## OpenSearch settings
opensearch:
  ## OpenSearch image settings
  image:
    repository: opensearchproject/opensearch
    tag: "2.16.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  ## Number of OpenSearch nodes
  replicas: 2
  
  ## JVM settings
  jvmOptions: "-Xmx512m -Xms512m"
  
  ## Resources settings
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 1Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
  
  ## Persistence settings
  persistence:
    enabled: true
    size: 30Gi
    storageClass: ""
  
  ## OpenSearch cluster settings
  cluster:
    name: opensearch-cluster
    masterNodes: 2
    ingestNodes: 2
    dataNodes: 2

## OpenSearch Dashboards settings
dashboards:
  enabled: true
  
  image:
    repository: opensearchproject/opensearch-dashboards
    tag: "2.16.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  replicas: 1
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
    requests:
      cpu: 250m
      memory: 256Mi
  
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 5601

## Security settings
security:
  enabled: false
  
  # Admin password secret (if security is enabled)
  adminSecret: ""

## Networking settings
networking:
  httpPort: 9200
  transportPort: 9300

## Metrics and monitoring
metrics:
  enabled: false
  prometheus:
    serviceMonitor:
      enabled: false

name: pinot
description: Apache Pinot is a real-time distributed OLAP datastore designed to answer OLAP queries with low latency.
values:
# Pinot configuration
# Ref: https://github.com/apache/pinot/blob/master/helm/pinot/values.yaml

## Global settings
global:
  imageRegistry: ""
  imagePullSecrets: []
  storageClass: ""

## Controller settings
controller:
  replicaCount: 1
  image:
    repository: apachepinot/pinot
    tag: "1.5.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 250m
      memory: 512Mi
  
  ## Persistence settings for controller
  persistence:
    enabled: true
    size: 10Gi
    storageClass: ""

## Broker settings
broker:
  replicaCount: 2
  image:
    repository: apachepinot/pinot
    tag: "1.5.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 250m
      memory: 512Mi

## Server settings
server:
  replicaCount: 2
  image:
    repository: apachepinot/pinot
    tag: "1.5.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 2Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
  
  ## Persistence settings for server
  persistence:
    enabled: true
    size: 20Gi
    storageClass: ""

## Zookeeper settings (for Pinot metadata)
zookeeper:
  enabled: true
  replicaCount: 3
  
  persistence:
    enabled: true
    size: 8Gi
    storageClass: ""
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
    requests:
      cpu: 250m
      memory: 256Mi
  
  heapSize: 256

## Metrics configuration
metrics:
  enabled: false
  prometheus:
    serviceMonitor:
      enabled: false

name: kafka
description: Apache Kafka is a distributed streaming platform designed to build real-time pipelines and can be used as a message broker or as a replacement for a shared database.
values:
# Kafka configuration
# Ref: https://github.com/bitnami/charts/blob/main/bitnami/kafka/values.yaml

## Global settings
global:
  imageRegistry: ""
  imagePullSecrets: []
  storageClass: ""

## Kafka configuration
kafka:
  ## Authentication in Kafka
  auth:
    clientProtocol: plain  # Possible values: plain, tls, mtls, sasl, oauthbearer
    interBrokerProtocol: plain
    
  ## Authorization in Kafka
  authorization:
    type: none  # Possible values: none, simple
    
  ## Kafka deployment configuration
  replicaCount: 3
  
  ## Kafka listeners configuration
  listeners:
    client:
      name: CLIENT
      port: 9092
      protocol: PLAINTEXT
    external:
      name: EXTERNAL
      port: 9094
      protocol: PLAINTEXT
      type: loadBalancer
  
  ## Persistence configuration
  persistence:
    enabled: true
    size: 8Gi
    storageClass: ""
  
  ## Resources configuration
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 2Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
  
  ## JVM configuration
  heapOpts: "-Xmx1024m -Xms1024m"

## Zookeeper settings
zookeeper:
  enabled: true
  replicaCount: 3
  
  persistence:
    enabled: true
    size: 8Gi
    storageClass: ""
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
    requests:
      cpu: 250m
      memory: 256Mi
  
  heapSize: 256

## Metrics configuration
metrics:
  kafka:
    enabled: false
    
  zookeeper:
    enabled: false
    
  jmx:
    enabled: false
  
## Network Policy configuration
networkPolicy:
  enabled: false

name: argo-cd
description: Declarative, GitOps continuous delivery tool for Kubernetes
values:
# ArgoCD configuration
# Ref: https://github.com/argoproj/argo-helm/blob/main/charts/argo-cd/values.yaml

## ArgoCD configuration
## Global settings
global:
  image:
    registry: quay.io
    repository: argoproj/argocd
    tag: "v3.1.8"

## Server configuration
server:
  name: server
  image: {}
  replicas: 1
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 8080
    targetPort: 8080
  ingress:
    enabled: false

## Redis configuration
redis:
  enabled: true
  name: redis
  image:
    registry: public.ecr.aws
    repository: docker/library/redis
    tag: 7.2-alpine

## Application controller configuration
applicationSet:
  enabled: true
  image:
    registry: quay.io
    repository: argoproj/applicationset
    tag: "v1.13.0"

dex:
  enabled: true
  name: dex-server
  image:
    registry: ghcr.io
    repository: dexidp/dex
    tag: "v2.40.0"

configs:
  # Admin user initial password
  secret:
    createSecret: true
    # argocdServerAdminPassword: ""
    # argocdServerAdminPasswordMtime: ""

name: nginx-ingress
description: Ingress controller for Kubernetes using NGINX as a reverse proxy and load balancer
values:
## nginx configuration
## Ref: https://github.com/kubernetes/ingress-nginx/blob/main/charts/ingress-nginx/values.yaml
controller:
  image:
    registry: k8s.gcr.io
    image: ingress-nginx/controller
    tag: "v1.10.1"
  replicaCount: 1
  service:
    type: LoadBalancer
    port: 80
    targetPorts:
      http: 80
      https: 443
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 100m
      memory: 90Mi
    requests:
      cpu: 100m
      memory: 90Mi

defaultBackend:
  enabled: false

prometheus:
  enabled: false

name: redis
description: Open source, advanced key-value store. It is often referred to as a data structure server since keys can contain strings, hashes, lists, sets and sorted sets.
values:
## @section Global parameters
## Global Docker image parameters
## Please, note that this will override the image parameters, including dependencies, configured to use the global value
## Current available global Docker image parameters: imageRegistry, imagePullSecrets and storageClass
##
global:
  imageRegistry: ""
  imagePullSecrets: []
  storageClass: ""

## @section Common parameters
##
## @param nameOverride String to partially override common.names.fullname
nameOverride: ""
## @param fullnameOverride String to fully override common.names.fullname
fullnameOverride: ""
## @param clusterDomain Default Kubernetes cluster domain
clusterDomain: cluster.local
## @param extraDeploy Array of extra objects to deploy with the release
extraDeploy: []

## Enable diagnostic mode in the deployment
diagnosticMode:
  enabled: false
  command:
    - sleep
  args:
    - infinity

## Bitnami Redis image version
## ref: https://hub.docker.com/r/bitnami/redis/tags/
## @param image.registry Redis image registry
## @param image.repository Redis image repository
## @param image.tag Redis image tag (immutable tags are recommended)
## @param image.digest Redis image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag
## @param image.pullPolicy Redis image pull policy
## @param image.pullSecrets Redis image pull secrets
image:
  registry: docker.io
  repository: bitnami/redis
  tag: 7.2.5-debian-12-r0
  digest: ""
  pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  pullSecrets: []

name: mongodb
description: NoSQL document-oriented database that stores JSON-like documents with dynamic schemas, simplifying the integration of data in content-driven applications.
values:
## @section Global parameters
## Global Docker image parameters
## Please, note that this will override the image parameters, including dependencies, configured to use the global value
## Current available global Docker image parameters: imageRegistry, imagePullSecrets and storageClass
##
global:
  imageRegistry: ""
  imagePullSecrets: []
  storageClass: ""
  mongodb:
    auth:
      rootPassword: ""
      passwords: []
      usernames: []
      database: ""
      replicaSetKey: ""
    service:
      ports:
        mongodb: 27017
      nodePorts:
        mongodb: ""
    architecture: standalone

## @section Common parameters
##
## @param nameOverride String to partially override common.names.fullname template (will maintain the release name)
nameOverride: ""

## @param fullnameOverride String to fully override common.names.fullname template
fullnameOverride: ""

## @param clusterDomain Default Kubernetes cluster domain
clusterDomain: cluster.local

## @param extraDeploy Array of extra objects to deploy with the release
extraDeploy: []

## @param commonLabels Labels to add to all deployed objects
commonLabels: {}

## @param commonAnnotations Annotations to add to all deployed objects
commonAnnotations: {}

## Enable diagnostic mode in the deployment
diagnosticMode:
  enabled: false
  command:
    - sleep
  args:
    - infinity

name: postgresql
description: Highly available PostgreSQL cluster. Supports both standalone and replicated deployments.
values:
## @section Global parameters
## Global Docker image parameters
## Please, note that this will override the image parameters, including dependencies, configured to use the global value
## Current available global Docker image parameters: imageRegistry, imagePullSecrets and storageClass
##
global:
  postgresql:
    auth:
      postgresPassword: ""
      database: ""
    service:
      ports:
        postgresql: 5432
  imageRegistry: ""
  imagePullSecrets: []
  storageClass: ""

## @section Common parameters
##
## @param nameOverride String to partially override common.names.fullname template (will maintain the release name)
nameOverride: ""

## @param fullnameOverride String to fully override common.names.fullname template
fullnameOverride: ""

## @param clusterDomain Kubernetes cluster domain name
clusterDomain: cluster.local

## @param extraDeploy Array of extra objects to deploy with the release
extraDeploy: []

## Enable diagnostic mode in the deployment
diagnosticMode:
  enabled: false
  command:
    - sleep
  args:
    - infinity

name: prometheus
description: Prometheus is a monitoring system and time series database.
values:
## Configuration for the main Prometheus server
##
server:
  enabled: true
  name: server
  image:
    registry: quay.io
    repository: prometheus/prometheus
    tag: "v2.53.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent

  ## Prometheus server ConfigMap entries
  ##
  configMap:
    enabled: true

  ## Configuration for the server's persistent volume
  ##
  persistentVolume:
    enabled: true
    size: 8Gi
    storageClass: ""
    accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce

  ## Resources for the Prometheus server
  ##
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
    requests:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
